mapper.select: select T.userId, T.totalCmsPayAmt, T.totalWithdrawAmt , case when T.totalCmsPayAmt > T.totalWithdrawAmt then T.totalCmsPayAmt - T.totalWithdrawAmt else 0 end unpaidAmt , case when T.totalWithdrawAmt > T.totalCmsPayAmt then T.totalWithdrawAmt - T.totalCmsPayAmt else 0 end depositAmt from ( select T1.userId , T1.totalCmsPayAmt , ifnull(sum(W.withdrawAmt), 0) totalWithdrawAmt from ( select U.id userId, ifnull(sum(S.cmsPayAmt), 0) totalCmsPayAmt from TO_USER U left outer join TO_SUBSCRIPTION S on U.id = S.buyerId and S.cmsTag like 'CMS%' group by U.id ) T1 left outer join CMS_USER CU on CU.userId = T1.userId left outer join CMS_WITHDRAW_HISTORY W on W.payerNo = CU.payerNo and W.status in ( '미납', '완납', '직접수납' ) group by T1.userId, T1.totalCmsPayAmt ) T where T.userId = #{userId}

select U.*, CH.parishName, CH.churchName userChurchName from TO_USER U join TO_USER_AUTHORITY UA on UA.userId = U.id and UA.authorityName = 'ROLE_CUSTOMER' join TO_USER_MANAGE_CHURCH UMC on UMC.userId = U.id join TO_CHURCH CH on CH.id = UMC.churchId where UMC.churchId = #{churchId}
select A.*, U.userLoginId from CMS_APPLICATION A join TO_USER U on A.userId = U.id where 1 = 1 and U.id = #{userId} order by A.id desc
select A.*, U.userLoginId from CMS_APPLICATION A join TO_USER U on A.userId = U.id where 1 = 1 and U.id = #{userId} and A.id = #{appId} order by A.id desc

select A.*, U.userLoginId from CMS_APPLICATION A join TO_USER U on A.userId = U.id join TO_USER_MANAGE_CHURCH UMC on UMC.churchId = U.churchId join TO_USER_AUTHORITY UA on UA.userId = UMC.userId and UA.authorityName = 'ROLE_CUSTOMER' where 1 = 1 and UMC.userId = #{managerUserId}
and U.userLoginId like CONCAT('%',#{keywordText},'%')
and U.userName like CONCAT('%',#{keywordText},'%')
order by A.id desc

select A.*, U.userLoginId from CMS_APPLICATION A join TO_USER U on A.userId = U.id join TO_USER_MANAGE_CHURCH UMC on UMC.churchId = U.churchId join TO_USER_AUTHORITY UA on UA.userId = UMC.userId and UA.authorityName = 'ROLE_CUSTOMER' where 1 = 1 and UMC.userId = #{managerUserId} and A.id = #{appId} order by A.id desc

select A.*, U.userLoginId from CMS_APPLICATION A join TO_USER U on A.userId = U.id where 1 = 1
and U.userLoginId like CONCAT('%',#{keywordText},'%')
and U.userName like CONCAT('%',#{keywordText},'%')
order by A.id desc
select A.*, U.userLoginId from CMS_APPLICATION A join TO_USER U on A.userId = U.id where 1 = 1 and A.id = #{appId}
